SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The terminology of the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) glossary.
SKOS_CONCEPT.label: CDISC Glossary

SKOS_CONCEPT_SCHEME.description: CDISC Controlled Terminology for Glossary is the set of CDISC-developed or CDISC-adopted standard expressions (values) used with data items within CDISC-defined GLOSSARY datasets.
SKOS_CONCEPT_SCHEME.label: Glossary Controlled Terminology Package 48 Effective 2021-12-17
SKOS_CONCEPT_SCHEME.name: Glossary CT 2021-12-17
SKOS_CONCEPT_SCHEME.source: Glossary Controlled Terminology developed by the CDISC Terminology Team in collaboration with the National Cancer Institute's Enterprise Vocabulary Services (EVS)
